message: Bob, I'm offering you this exceptional product for $1800000. I believe it holds tremendous value, and I'm confident you'll see the potential it offers. Let's discuss this further.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1400000 for it.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to be flexible. However, $1400000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1600000. This reflects the true value of the product and gives you a fair price. Let's make this deal work.

I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, but $1600000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1500000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I've seen so far.
Bob, I appreciate your offer and the back-and-forth we've had. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1550000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's close this deal now.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $1450000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I've seen so far.
